message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product which I think you'll find very valuable. I'm asking for $95 for it. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay up to $85 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your offer but I'm hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. How about we settle on $90? This is still a great deal for you, and it gives me a fair price for my product. Let me know what you think.
Hi Alice, I understand your position. I'd like to stick to my previous offer of $85. I hope we can come to an agreement.
